title: Skype and League Causes Computer to Crash
body: Recently after the new Windows 10 update (sorry it was unavoidable) and the new League update anytime I try to Skype my friends and play LoL at the same time it freezes. I don't mean oops there it goes I mean it makes an intense noise that scares the crap out of me and I have to hold down the power button for a sold 3 seconds before it turns off. I've deleted both Skype and League and reinstalled them both. I even installed the Skype that is for the new Windows 10 update and it still happens. I load into the game and 3 seconds in, boom, gone. My boyfriend went in and updated my drivers for everything including my graphics card yet nothing is working. It only happens with League. I can Skype on Overwatch and everything else but with League it's like nah. Any advice would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: A recent update with Windows caused some problems with the xbox game bar, and it's causing League to freeze and make odd sounds for some players.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
